atbat.des: Kevin Millwood intentionally walks Ichiro Suzuki.
atbat.des_es: Kevin Millwood recibe base por bolas intencional Ichiro Suzuki.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Kevin Millwood; Ichiro Suzuki is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .990 OPS against them this season and .806 against everything else.
Kevin Millwood is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
